website_summaries.verdict: These noise cancelling ear plugs are a unique alternative to basic rubber disposable kinds.
pros: These let the outside sounds you want to hear in (like your alarm clock), filtering out sharp acoustic sounds that can cause tinnitus and hearing loss
1 pair of NRR 23 and 1 pair of NRR 27 high fidelity noise reduction included
cons: They don't block out noise very well – better for muffling sound

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable- Keeps things quiet- Case is handy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because you get 2 pair and the case. I hung the case (containing both pairs) from my tool bag so they follow me wherever I go. They block noise really well. I’ve spent a couple 8 hour days drilling into concrete ceilings with a hammer drill right next to my ear/head wearing these. They stay comfortable and the noise of the drill doesn’t get to me. My only complaint is when you cram both pairs into the case it’s a little difficult to get them back out- not enough of an annoyance to take a star away though.
customer_reviews.author: Owen

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the cost
customer_reviews.text: I own a set of professionally made earplugs and these were intended to be a low cost backup for the expensive set I rarely have with me when I need them. I've only owned these for a couple of weeks, but so far I'm very happy with their construction and function. I am a professional audio engineer and a hobby musician and am infamous for being a critical b***ard. The fit is excellent, at least as secure and well-sealed as my expensive plugs. While you'll experience a high frequency roll-off with music, it's not intolerable or un-listenable. It's just a fact that high frequencies are easier to block than low.
customer_reviews.author: GeezerCaveman

customer_reviews.title: The best ever
customer_reviews.text: I work at night and I live on a very busy street and behind the freeway at least it sounds like it. These ear plugs block every kind of noise there is and the are my go always.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Invest In Your Ear!
customer_reviews.text: Worked wonderfully! As a lead singer surrounded by amps and cymbals being able to hear at the end of a night and hold pitch is the musical key! Thank you Sound Wave!
customer_reviews.author: Brian John Evans

customer_reviews.title: These won’t help anyone needing decreased noise
customer_reviews.text: I can still hear the sound of whispering. I bought these to cut down loud talking and singing. It doesn’t even block the sound of a person whispering.
customer_reviews.author: Tonks Plum

customer_reviews.title: Best Service and Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The company is excellent and sent me follow up emails thanking me for purchasing the product and then when it was going to arrive. The earplugs are comfortable and definitely reduce the volume while still allowing me to hear the music clearly. I haven't used them at the concert I'm going to yet but I tried them with loud volume in my car and they worked like I had hoped. Definitely give these guys a chance and purchase earplugs from them.
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I got these to try and drown out noise in my apartment and not only were they very uncomfortable, it didn't work. I'm sure they work great for things like a concert or event but I'd read they were good for surrounding noise as well. I don't wear them, waste of money for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Provost

customer_reviews.title: I have had to wear ear plugs that goes straight in the ear and this is by far the best I've bought
customer_reviews.text: Went to an outdoor shooting range with this ear plugs and it did its job well. I have had to wear ear plugs that goes straight in the ear and this is by far the best I've bought. I will continue to use these in outdoor ranges since I do not like wearing those big ear protections.
customer_reviews.author: 50kx12

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty darned good at noise-cancelling and they don't cause ear soreness after wearing them nightly. I've tried many others, needing to adjust & adjust. They nestle right where they should be and done! Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy B

customer_reviews.title: We SOOOOO love these noise canceling earplugs
customer_reviews.text: We SOOOOO love these noise canceling earplugs! My daughter plays the sax in high school jazz band and the trombones sit RIGHT behind her. At times she feels like her ears are bleeding! UNLESS she has these... THANKS for protecting her hearing!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Pupo

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.....
customer_reviews.text: My husband is nearly deaf and tries really hard to make me the same way. Our surround sound is deafening to me, so HE can hear it. These have made is so much more bearable. Very comfortable, even the first time I wore them. Very happy with these. I may make it to 70 in a few years with my hearing intact.
customer_reviews.author: Prinny

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! The carrying case can only hold one pair at a time, although I don't see that being a common issue. They allow for clear sound but keep out the loud sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Didn't cancel anything
customer_reviews.text: It muffled the sound but did not cancel anything out, even a little. It was like putting my hands over my ear, compared to the standard cheap foam ones they didn't work as well as those.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Kell

customer_reviews.title: Didn't block out enough noise
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money on these. They DO NOT block out enough noise!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never remove filters, cuts lifetime instantly
customer_reviews.text: All 4 plugs had their filters pop off on their own over the span of time since I ordered them & the last one just did tonight. Now I have none that function properly because THE FILTERS NEVER STAY ON ONCE THEY COME OFF. Dont ever clean them or remove them for any reason or you'll have wasted your money (tho I wasted money thinking these would be any good)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for concerts
customer_reviews.text: I used these for a concert last night- they were uncomfortable, and the protection they provide is far less than I had hoped. They were hard to remove from the case without using a tool (keys worked). Today my ears are ringing like I had no hearing protection at all.
customer_reviews.author: Heavy Skinz

customer_reviews.title: Quiet Zone
customer_reviews.text: Sounds like a sitcom I know, but these ear plugs are perfect when your hubby is a champion....snorer! Looking forward to better sleep, thanks so much.
customer_reviews.author: Hot in the South

customer_reviews.title: Love love these earplugs!
customer_reviews.text: Love these earplugs - excellent quality and amazing price, especially for 2 sets! We used them at the gun range and they cancelled the noise perfectly! I will be buying another set, possibly more since they are such a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Bubbles

customer_reviews.title: They worked great; she comfortably enjoyed the show
customer_reviews.text: I took my daughter to her first concert and her ears are sensitive so I bought these. They worked great; she comfortably enjoyed the show.
customer_reviews.author: Karen I. Medina

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are really high quality. I use them when playing in a Samba percussion group and I can adjust them to cut out most noise or almost all noise depending on how far I seat them into my ears.
customer_reviews.author: ARo

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Good price and comfort I use them for sleeping at night and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Ole Sarge

customer_reviews.title: Hurt to sleep in
customer_reviews.text: These work pretty well but are not comfortable to sleep on. Fine if you don’t lay on your side.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Latham

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: No complaints - very good quality and the container they give you to store them in is sturdy/high quality. I’m a mechanic and also attend concerts and these have not yet let me down. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Johns

customer_reviews.title: Good earplugs
customer_reviews.text: not the best for sleeping, but I have used them at concerts and just walking around. They help to reduce really loud noises and static, while actually making it easier to hear people sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel ElecTrip

customer_reviews.title: Size just a bit small with no clear instructions
customer_reviews.text: The fit was too small, no clear instructions on weather they were washable or how to take out the filter. No instructions also on environment each worked best in, couldn't really tell a difference. Other than that first day of use and they're okay. Just need to push them in more to cover my ear hole.
customer_reviews.author: charliemagne

customer_reviews.title: Fits well but doesn't suppress loud noises well.
customer_reviews.text: The plugs fit well. Not the ear plugs that you need if you're trying to protect your hearing from loud noise.
customer_reviews.author: William A. Atherton

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Work well - with this and over ear blocking headphones was able to drown out my girlfriends meowing cat.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Don't block noise and unsafe
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for me & my partner as we are both snorers and when wearing them to sleep I could still hear snoring. We both experienced having the earplugs slip deeper in our ears and they had to be removed by tweezers. Since this happened we have not worn them and had to buy other moldable earplugs that are safer and block out the noise sufficiently.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Robinson

customer_reviews.title: They don't fall out.
customer_reviews.text: Of several brands, these are the first that stay in my ears, and they are excellent at blocking low frequency sounds. Still have not found the right ones for high frequency power line noise.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia B. Spellman

customer_reviews.title: Great for concerts!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these to use at concerts, and they work great! These earplugs filtered out enough of the sound (in the front row) so that we were able to enjoy the show and still hear after. They're pretty comfortable too!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: The buds themselves work fine. The container sucks
customer_reviews.text: The buds themselves work fine. The container sucks. It makes this noise that sounds like nails on a chalkboard and the buds get stuck inside
customer_reviews.author: Arianna

customer_reviews.title: I'm a steel worker surrounded with loud noise. These ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a steel worker surrounded with loud noise. These SoundWave earplugs block the unwanted noise and allow me to still communicate. They are truly a must have. No more junk, foam, disposable earplugs.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Hollyfield

customer_reviews.title: In the package, an incomplete number of elements is declared
customer_reviews.text: In the package, an incomplete number of elements is declared 4 in fact. In the package there are only two elements.
customer_reviews.author: Vikctor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and shipped fast. Also came with a cool case!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan G. Peters

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Went to a concert recently, used these ear plugs, and it saved our ears! The concert was indoors in a stadium, it was insanely loud, but these plugs helped a lot. No tinnitus afterwards! Product works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: rendering them useless.
customer_reviews.text: Ear plugs broke off from the filters, rendering them useless.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Long

customer_reviews.title: Huh? What did you say? 😄
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product that performs as described by blocking out unwanted sounds. It didn’t take very long for my ears to get used to them. They fall out occasionally during sleep, or maybe I rip them out, I don’t know but other than that I have no issue.
customer_reviews.author: free_man

customer_reviews.title: These earplugs feel great. Much more secure than silicone and way more ...
customer_reviews.text: These earplugs feel great. Much more secure than silicone and way more comfortable than foam! The cap of the holder is a great place to store the spare plugs.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Not a great fit.
customer_reviews.text: The rubber is strange and stiff - didn’t conform to my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas J. Pawson

customer_reviews.title: ear plugs are pretty comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: ear plugs are hard to get out because they stick on the inside. Also, the container is a bit big. Other than that, ear plugs are pretty comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Israel Torres

customer_reviews.title: Block out the noise but not the sound
customer_reviews.text: I wore these to a music festival as I had recently had some head trauma and couldn't be around ultra loud sound. These ear plugs took out the loud decibels of noise but I could clearly hear the music. They were awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: not what I expected buy... I'll hold on to them and see if they work in time....
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: These work
customer_reviews.text: Great protection while still allowing me to hear the music. Like it so much I bought a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Page

customer_reviews.title: good quality product and affordable
customer_reviews.text: great fit function well worth the money spent to protect hearing would buy again
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: He said they were much more comfortable than the foam or rubber options
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband to use for hypersensitive hearing. He said they were much more comfortable than the foam or rubber options, and the filtering is so much beter.
customer_reviews.author: Lois H.

customer_reviews.title: You can lose them very easily.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a waste of money. It so easy to lose an ear plug because they slip off so easily from the filters and the short cord provided. Not to mention my cord was a bit frayed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: cool but does not block out noise that good to me.
customer_reviews.author: madcow

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and practial
customer_reviews.text: comfortable and practical this earplugs help me to stand the loud party of my anoying neightbors ill start using on my work and public transport thanks
customer_reviews.author: Luis Glz

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, wish it was a litter tighter ...
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, wish it was a litter tighter but it works. Helps when you're in a pinch and you can still hear people when tell talk.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: No irritation!
customer_reviews.text: I was having a reaction to the earplugs my employer provides. These have worked wonderfully. They did not cause my ears to be sore or irritated and I was able to clean them and resize them.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Bueker

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best I've ever used!! Still allows clear hearing all while cancelling the high frequency pain. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Don't work at all unless you put them so far your ear they're touching your ear drum and that hurts.
customer_reviews.author: randall labarge

customer_reviews.title: No one should buy that product
customer_reviews.text: Very poor design very poor design does not do the job very unhappy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to sleep in. Thank you from this night shifter!
customer_reviews.author: Kris Heintz

customer_reviews.title: Sanitation in storage facility
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived a short while ago. Excited to see and experience product Opened the canister last and there are two dead spiders in canisters. This gave me an instant headache ( normally do not get headaches).
customer_reviews.author: Judith Holmes,Judith Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Difficult
customer_reviews.text: Are terrible quality, difficult to take out, no proper tab for grip.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: I use this for work. Work as a diesel tech.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Dice

customer_reviews.title: Total disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Total nonsense. 50 cent earplugs better value. Could hear everything
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Leigh

customer_reviews.title: I like that the ear plugs are discrete and fit comfortably
customer_reviews.text: I like that the ear plugs are discrete and fit comfortably
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A young

customer_reviews.title: They don't work.
customer_reviews.text: these ear plugs were worthless . Cotton balls work better , and I'm not joking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Irritates the ear. Does not block noises. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: IR Student

customer_reviews.title: I love the way they took the time to speak to ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the way they took the time to speak to their customers and wrote a heartfelt letter. Keep going! I love the plugs and the case.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Finaly i had a chance to use them in a ...
customer_reviews.text: Finaly i had a chance to use them in a birthday party with loud dj music , it had very little protction for loud music , i have to try anouther ear protection , we left after an hour because my ears were hurting, this product did not work for me
customer_reviews.author: Armik G

customer_reviews.title: I was not happy with these plugs
customer_reviews.text: I was not happy with these plugs. The noise cancelling was not to my expectation. I went back to the foam ear plugs.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia m.

customer_reviews.title: But these for whatever your needs-they work!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these! I’ve recently traveled with my Mum who is quite the evening songbird-and I don’t mean arias and show tunes. We shared a bedroom and the worst of it was incredibly muffled; an otherwise silent and peaceful sleep environment. I also used them while riding a motorcycle to dull the growling motor, and at a concert while standing next to giant speakers; no ringing ears at the end if either activity. I’m here to tell you, after many earplugs have been tested, whatever your need, these are the answer.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hardie-Vallone

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but not worth it
customer_reviews.text: The product is no better than the earplugs I have bought for $7.99 from CVS. The handles are so short that it is easy to get the plugs stuck in your ear and I found that the only thing useful is the case that holds the plugs. The marketing, packaging and colorful display is great but the ear plugs themselves, I find to be garbage which is what I threw them in.
customer_reviews.author: J W

customer_reviews.title: work's great
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive hearing and after years and years of enduring the blowers in our neighborhood I decided I needed to do something about it, so I purchased these ear plugs and I am thrilled!! While I guess nothing completely eliminates the god awful noise of blowers, these ear plugs helps more than I thought they would. I was going to go see my ETN doctor to get a custom pair made, but now I think these will work for me. This world has gotten so loud I carry these with me now. So happy.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria K. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Good noise reduction
customer_reviews.text: I got these to wear while I referee for roller derby. After practice I tend to feel like I've just left a concert, with that cotton in the ears feeling. I wore these last night for the first time at practice, and they made a huge difference! I could still (mostly) hear what folks were saying, but the shrill blasts of the whistle were deadened enough that I wasn't bothered by them so much. Not to mention, I felt totally fine when I left, no more cotton ears!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: This is great
customer_reviews.text: Some of my family members are hard of hearing and have to have the TV so loud I get headaches. I bought these earplugs so I could be in the same room and watch TV with them. I can still hear the TV and people talking but at a lower volume. This is great
customer_reviews.author: William Young

customer_reviews.title: Warning
customer_reviews.text: The string that comes with them is not strong enough to stay attached to the earplugs. They will fall off and then it's a pain to try and get the earplugs out of your ear. There is little to no space to use your fingers to grab them. There needs to be a permanent handle attached to the earplugs so you can get them out. It's very dangerous, as they can keep going in the ear without a way to get them out.
customer_reviews.author: mew

customer_reviews.title: Cheap is not always best.
customer_reviews.text: The cord keeps coming out and the plugs have to be extracted with longnose pliers or strong tweezers, short of a doctor's visit. My wife has become an expert amateur ear specialist.Once I was alone and had the bloody things in my ear canals for several hours. Will try crazy-glue to keep them from coming loose, but the cord will be stuck into one pair making the second useless.
customer_reviews.author: Jose A. Colon

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a light sleeper and these are a life-saver! You can still hear noise, but these block out just enough to allow you to sleep without waking at every little sound. I wear them almost every night and they wash up easy.
customer_reviews.author: Love a Good Book

customer_reviews.title: Great for loud noises
customer_reviews.text: I pretty much live in a loud, noisy gym and have been concerned about my hearing. These do a great job at muffling the loud whistles, noise and background that exists while allowing for a normal conversation with someone right next to you. Very good product and would not leave home without them. The storage is nice to have as well as I use a small caribeaner and attach it to my jacket.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste the money
customer_reviews.text: I would not waste your money. I put the ear plugs in and could still hear everything very clearly. It was just I had something in my ear. Better off buying the cheap foam ones from CVS.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Great at concerts!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two pairs of these for my wife and I when we went to a few small venue shows and they were amazing! They fit nicely and were comfortable for the whole shows. They cut out the extreme volume without really muffling the sound so we could still actually hear the music and each other! Definitely can recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: AZbadfish

customer_reviews.title: These are GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: These are GREAT!!!! The quality, comfort and noise cancellation are awesome! Plus you get a travel case to put or hang them anywhere! Grab yourself one or two and put them in your bag, backpack, work truck, or family van!
customer_reviews.author: Jon E.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Love these ear plugs, I have a noisy air-conditioner and it works great, I purchased for when I fly, So I know these will be great on the plane. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: YVONNE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so great! Excellent set of ear plugs that fit very well in the ears.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Lee

customer_reviews.title: Save your hearing
customer_reviews.text: These ear plugs do a great job of cutting down noise while still being able to hear voices if close by. I have started to wear them all the time unless indoors.
customer_reviews.author: D Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Use at work, can still hear surrounding talk but makes most conversations a mumble. For me, that is good enough!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs down
customer_reviews.text: Not very effective. I used one set without the string on the insides popped while in use. I would not recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the cord or lanyard is difficult to attach and disengages from earplugs too easily when using
customer_reviews.text: both sets of plugs and cord don't fit in package, the cord or lanyard is difficult to attach and disengages from earplugs too easily when using... also package was pre-opened and taped close. this made me feel someone had used thiese earplugs before me. Eeeeew!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pauline A.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ear plugs!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these!!! They fit my ears perfectly and they work great to reduce noise. The metal case is really well made and a very handy feature for carrying these on a keychain.
customer_reviews.author: ganache

customer_reviews.title: They work great. The only issue is there is two pairs ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for going to shows. They work great. The only issue is there is two pairs but putting both in the case makes it near impossible to get them out. A bigger case would have been nice.
customer_reviews.author: joseph S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Pair of Earplugs!
customer_reviews.text: Work perfectly for my husband when at theatre or concerts. Can enjoy the sound WAY better than the muffled sound from the foam ear plugs. Worth the price...
customer_reviews.author: KidsnTeachin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These fit very comfortably and reduce noise without adding distortion.
customer_reviews.author: Cory P.

customer_reviews.title: Good earplugs
customer_reviews.text: Good earplugs. Case provided is a little too narrow to easily get earplugs and provided neck strap in. They go, but bend earplugs.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn P.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandfather for christmas. He uses them for mowing the lawn and outdoor work, he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hudgens-Laffey

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These don't work at all...I can hear everything with them in my ear....really disapointed. do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia H.

customer_reviews.title: Carry Case Unscrewed Itself and Came Off...
customer_reviews.text: ... during the first use at a music festival. Barely used them and lost all of the components inside the case.
customer_reviews.author: Beata H

customer_reviews.title: Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, they work as described and the case fits in my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: K W

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: The silicone caused so much suction on my inner ear it caused a bit of vertigo, so no, they don't work for me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the fact that they are so easy to insert
customer_reviews.text: Yes ~ they work. I love the fact that they are so easy to insert. I store them in my purse as I have sensitive hearing.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Protection for your ears.......perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. I used them this weekend for a Concert. I did not have that horrible after effect of fuzzy ears after we left the arena. I will make sure I always have these in my purse, when attending events.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Work, but itchy
customer_reviews.text: They work, but they must have latex in them My ear canal itches after just a couple minutes of wear
customer_reviews.author: zara dozier

customer_reviews.title: Good ear plugs
customer_reviews.text: These are the best ear plugs. I’ve purchased different brand and these have been the best so far. They do not 100% cancel the noise but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Bago

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Work well cancelling out outside nouse. Uncomfortable for me to sleep with but they do their job.
customer_reviews.author: Tiggy19

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for my wife but not at all for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Exactly what I was looking for! Makes a huge difference. Muffles loud noises and I can hear people clearly next to me.
customer_reviews.author: Grant & Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Really nice, but only lasted 3 months
customer_reviews.text: These earplugs worked well for approximately 3 months, blocking out my roommates snores. But they broke from normal use after that. There is a connector that connects the earplug to the strap that holds the earplugs together. This little piece stopped holding on to the sound blocking portion and will just fall out now. Attached is a video showing what exactly happens. I really like this product, I will probably end up buying some super glue to hold that piece together
customer_reviews.author: MaesterMatt

product_meta.title: SoundWave Ear Plugs Noise Reduction- Noise Cancelling Earplugs for Studying and Sleeping - Sound Blocking Reusable High Fidelity Concert Hearing Protection - Great for Reducing Harmful
product_meta.description:
Size:0Professional Grade Earplugs for Any Environment

Do you want maximum effectiveness reusable ear plugs that you can take with you anywhere?

These are the perfect daily earplugs for construction workers, industrial workers, shooting enthusiasts, DJs, bands, music festival lovers, concert goers, drummers, and musicians of all types.

Sleep Better Than Ever & Reduce Snoring Noises

SoundWaves adult ear plugs are comfy to wear while sleeping and help muffle unwanted noises from snoring, the street, neighbors and even children and babies.

The portable aluminum storage container means you can take them with you on air planes and trains. Sleep better than ever before while traveling or on the go.

Protect Your Ear Canal

Each silicone rubber ear plug is designed with the highest standards in safety and comfort. Clear semi-invisible coloring with white and green filters are soft and low profile to offer discrete comfort and anti-noise protection for everyone. 

Reusable & Washable Hypoallergenic Material

Essential for anyone with sensitive ears who needs regular acoustic or audio filtering.

Perfect for Studying, Reading & Meditation.

Don’t think these ear plugs are just for high noise environments and events. Study, read and think in peace no matter where you are.

Use either foam roller to loosen the fibers in your sore muscles in the comfort of your own home.

Get rid of unwanted background noise and conversations…office workers really love our ear plugs too!

Join endless satisfied customers embracing silence...CLICK ADD TO CART and Order TODAY!
feature_bullets: PROTECT YOUR EARS: High Decibel loud external noises can have devastating short and long term effects on your hearing. Filter outside noises and reduce inner ear damage with our noise reduction ear plugs for men and women.

COMFORTABLE & SAFE: Each case comes with 2 pairs of corded ear plugs. One pair of NRR 23 and one pair of NRR 27 high fidelity ear plugs accommodate small, medium, and large ears and can easily be worn under helmets, hats, and work headgear. Soundwave reusable ear plugs are made from soft silicone rubber for extreme comfort all day long.

MULTI-FUNCTIONAL & PORTABLE: The lightweight aluminum case easily fits on a keychain or in your pocket, keeping custom ear plugs clean & dry from the outside environment. Your silicone ear plugs are versatile making them perfect for going to concerts, parades, sporting events, festivals and on airplanes.

PRESERVES SOUND QUALITY: Each set of hifi earplugs still allow some exterior sounds in. We've designed our sleeping earplugs to block the harmful noises to help reduce ear damage and tinnitus while preserving sound quality.

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: Whether you use your soundwave noise reduction ear plug to study, in the workplace, in clubs and parties or simply to help you sleep by reducing snoring noises…each pair is backed by our 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you encounter any issues in your noise reducing earplugs, please contact us for a Guaranteed Replacement or Your Money Back!
